body: @tobajas thanks for giving a summary thats help me imagine the conversation. I just some translation do their magic so we get the english

Well story in a nutshell is wife goes on a trip with the neighbourhood after they win some hotspring trip. The husband can't come along but the brother-in-law comes with them. Once they get there the other neighbours starts getting the two drunk and then drugs first the chaperone then goes on to drug the wife as well after which they pretty much rape her all night til early morning. Then it pretty much ends with the wife starting to wake up from her drugged state and confused at everything that has happened thinking it was all a dream until she notices she's covered in and dripping sperm. While the brother-in-law who's just woken up starts banging on the door to which she is confused at first but then goes he can't enter cause she's changing. Which is pretty much how it ends.
